name: FSTC EUROPE S.A
about: FSTC Europe ATO, located in Athens, Greece, is an EASA-approved Training Organization dedicated to providing high-quality aviation training. Our management team and instructors are highly experienced aviators from the global aviation industry. We offer type rating courses on various aircraft, including the Airbus A320, Boeing 737NG, EMB 135/145, ATR 42/72, and Q400, along with TRI/SFI courses. Our state-of-the-art facilities and equipment ensure realistic training experiences. Ground school and simulator training are conducted in our Athens facility and other locations such as Amsterdam, London, and Istanbul. With a commitment to excellence and safety, FSTC Europe is the ideal choice for pilots seeking advanced training. Join us to elevate your aviation career with the best training available.
